thread.title: PCB denies involvement in a Greece team's visit to Pakistan
thread.title_full: PCB denies involvement in a Greece team's visit to Pakistan

title: PCB denies involvement in a Greece team's visit to Pakistan
text:
Just in: _ You are here: Home » Sports » Cricket » PCB denies involvement in a Greece team's visit to Pakistan Friday, 16 October 2015 15:38 Posted by Parvez Jabri 23 
ISLAMABAD: Pakistan Cricket Board (PCB) on Friday refuted its involvement in the visit of a Greece cricket team's visit to Pakistan, clarifying that the touring team was not the national team of Greece. 
A media report on Friday has claimed that Greek players visited Pakistan but failed to play series against Pakistan and even no PCB official welcomed them. 
"It is true a team from Greece had arrived Pakistan on the invitation of some individuals from Sialkot. But that was an unofficial team and we were not involved in that," a PCB spokesman told APP. 
"PCB's support was sought for the tour, but with the relevant government clearances promised by the team not forthcoming, we had declined to support the tour," he added. 
He said that the Greece cricket authorities were informed well in advance of the team embarking on its journey to Pakistan. Copyright AFP (Agence France-Presse), 2015
